member.name: T:Waher.Networking.XMPP.Contracts.ContractState
member.summary: Recognized contract states

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.XMPP.Contracts.ContractState.Proposed
member.summary: The contract has been proposed as a new contract. It needs to be revied and approved by the Trust Provider before it can be used as a template or be signed.

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.XMPP.Contracts.ContractState.Rejected
member.summary: The contract has been deemed incomplete, inconsistent, or otherwise faulty. A rejected contract cannot be used as a template or be signed. A rejected contract can be updated by the creator, and thus be put in a Proposed state again.

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.XMPP.Contracts.ContractState.Approved
member.summary: The contract has been reviewed and approved. It is still not signed, but can act as a template for other contracts.

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.XMPP.Contracts.ContractState.BeingSigned
member.summary: The contract is being signed. Not all reuired roles have signed however, and the contract is not legally binding.

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.XMPP.Contracts.ContractState.Signed
member.summary: The contract has been signed by all required parties, and is legally binding.

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.XMPP.Contracts.ContractState.Obsoleted
member.summary: The contract has been explicitly obsoleted by its owner, or by the Trust Provider.

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.XMPP.Contracts.ContractState.Deleted
member.summary: The contract has been explicitly deleted by its owner, or by the Trust Provider.

member.name: T:Waher.Networking.XMPP.Contracts.ContractVisibility
member.summary: Visibility types for contracts.

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.XMPP.Contracts.ContractVisibility.CreatorAndParts
member.summary: Contract is only accessible to the creator, and any parts in the contract.

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.XMPP.Contracts.ContractVisibility.DomainAndParts
member.summary: Contract is accessible to the creator of the contract, any parts in the contract, and any account on the Trust Provider server domain.

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.XMPP.Contracts.ContractVisibility.Public
member.summary: Contract is accessible by everyone requesting it. It is not searchable.

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.XMPP.Contracts.ContractVisibility.PublicSearchable
member.summary: Contract is accessible by everyone requesting it. It is also searchable.
